SEARCH
Package GameEngine

Class Shape

java.lang.Object
GameEngine.Shape
public class Shape extends Object
Class that represents a drawable shape with image, size, and offset. Handles loading images, rendering, and animation frame loading.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a Shape with the given parameters.

  • Constructor Details

    • Shape

      public Shape(String name, int width, int height, int offsetX, int offsetY)
      Constructs a Shape with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the image file (without extension)
      width - the width of the shape
      height - the height of the shape
      offsetX - x-offset for rendering
      offsetY - y-offset for rendering

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render(Graphics g, ITransform t, boolean flip, double angle)
      Renders the shape using the given graphics context, transform, flip, and angle.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics context
      t - the transform to apply
      flip - whether to flip horizontally
      angle - the rotation angle in degrees

    • loadAnimation

      public static List<Shape> loadAnimation(String baseName, int frameCount, int scale)
      Loads a list of Shape frames for an animation.
      Parameters:
      baseName - the base name of the animation frames
      frameCount - the number of frames
      scale - the scale factor for each frame
      Returns:
      a list of Shape objects representing the animation frames
